asap.speechengine

Class TimedTTSUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.realizer.planunit.TimedAbstractPlanUnit
      • asap.speechengine.TimedAbstractSpeechUnit
        • asap.speechengine.TimedTTSUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    asap.realizer.planunit.TimedPlanUnit
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimedDirectTTSUnit, TimedWavTTSUnit

    public abstract class TimedTTSUnit
extends TimedAbstractSpeechUnit
    A TimedPlanUnit that contains speech played back through a TTS system, either directly or via a .wav file
    Author:
    Herwin
